name: Notion Knowledge Vaults
description: Save and track all your learning materials in one place!Knowledge Vaults Notion Template will be your second brain to store all your valuable learnings and materials you want to track to digest later anytime.I made this to help me keep my consistency in achieving personal development as an educator. Students could also use it to organize their study materials and categorize the learning formats.Main Features:1️⃣ Save all your learning materials2️⃣ Track your learning progress3️⃣ Categorize conte
